channel.title: +1 Forward - FitD Series - Blades in the Dark
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-fitd-blades-in-the-dark
Rach and Rich kick off their second Summer Series. This series will cover games in the Forged in the Dark (FitD) style of PbtA games. This first episode features John Harper, creator of *​Blades in the Dark* , the first FitD game.
*(we even renamed the segments!)*
Timecodes: 00:01:05 - Setting Position and Effect 00:09:08 - Progress Clock 00:24:00 - The Score
You can follow John on Twitter: https://twitter.com/john_harper Purchase games like *Blades in the Dark* and *Agon* on Evil Hat's site here: https://www.evilhat.com/home/category/our-productions/ John's older games can be found here: http://www.onesevendesign.com/
